listitem.simpara: GT-267: /etc/globus/globus-condor.conf is not marked as a config file in RPM spec
GT-268: GRAM job manager seg module fails to replay first log of the month on restart
GT-270: job manager crash at shutdown (extra_envvar free)
GT-276: PBS SEG module isn't robust against log files becoming unavailable
GT-295: Missing dependency in globus_scheduler_event_generator debian native packages
GT-298: Leading whitespace confuses rvf parser
